item.title: 欧洲央行的危险警告加剧了对稳定性的担忧
item.description: 今年 11 月份的金融稳定报告相当暗淡【原文：This year’s round of November financial stability reports has been pretty bleak】

item.title: TikTok 在边滚动边购物方面取得了巨大成功
item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，库尔特-瓦格纳（Kurt Wagner）将探讨 TikTok 的电子商务努力--TikTok Shop--的成功萌芽。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Kurt Wagner looks at the budding success of TikTok’s e-commerce effort, TikTok Shop.】

item.title: 英国财政报告称，英国将主要财政规则的缓冲资金提高至 220 亿英镑
item.description: 根据预算责任办公室提前发布的预测，英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）能够将财政缓冲资金扩大到220亿英镑（约合290亿美元）。【原文：Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves was able to expand her fiscal buffer to £22 billion ($29 billion), according to an early release of the Office for Budget for Responsibility forecast.】

item.title: 特朗普宣称的美国投资热潮在审视下显得小了很多
item.description: 彭博社分析显示，特朗普夸大了投资承诺意外之财的三倍【原文：Bloomberg analysis shows Trump is overstating investment pledge windfall by a factor of three】

item.title: 美国购房申请飙升至 2023 年以来最高点
item.description: 尽管借贷成本依然高企，美国的购房抵押贷款申请上周仍猛增至 2023 年初以来的最高水平。【原文：US mortgage applications to buy a home surged last week to the highest level since early 2023, despite still-elevated borrowing costs.】

item.title: 投资者畅想后鲍威尔时代的美联储
item.description:
凯文-哈塞特（Kevin Hassett）已成为下一任美联储主席的热门人选。如果他获得任命，投资者预计利率将下调。【原文：

Kevin Hassett has emerged as the frontrunner to be the next Federal Reserve chair. If he’s appointed, investors expect lower interest rates. 

】

item.title: 药品和医院需求强劲，医疗保健行业收益居 S&P 500 指数之首
item.description: 美国最大的公共医疗保健公司在第三季度的表现优于其他行业，原因是新药和特药使用量增加、减肥药需求持续旺盛以及医院就诊趋势强劲，这些因素都推动了公司盈利的增长。【原文：The largest American public health-care companies outperformed other industries in the third quarter, as higher new and specialty drug use, continued demand for weight-loss drugs and strong hospital visit trends boosted earnings.】

item.title: 据称阿美石油公司将选择花旗银行出售储油库股权
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，沙特阿美公司已选择花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：Saudi Aramco has chosen Citigroup Inc. to help arrange a potential multibillion-dollar stake sale in its oil export and storage terminals business, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 迪尔展望未来，农业反弹仍遥遥无期
item.description: 迪尔公司（Deere & Co.【原文：Deere & Co.’s first outlook for the year ahead fell short of expectations as uncertainly continues to surround the timing for a recovery in the US farm economy.】

item.title: 印度批准 8.15 亿美元稀土计划以刺激本地产出
item.description: 印度内阁批准了一项价值 728 亿卢比（约合 8.15 亿美元）的稀土磁铁激励计划，加大了该国建设国内产能和减少对中国依赖的力度。【原文：India’s cabinet has approved a 72.8 billion rupee ($815 million) incentive program for rare earth magnets, intensifying the country’s push to build domestic capacity and reduce its dependence on China.】

item.title: 建立外汇缓冲区，津巴布韦希望到 2030 年实现单一货币化
item.description: 津巴布韦央行副行长表示，津巴布韦希望建立足够的外汇缓冲区，以便在未来三年内过渡到单一货币，并在日常交易中逐步淘汰美元的使用。【原文：Zimbabwe expects to build a sufficient foreign-exchange buffer to enable it to transition to a single currency and phase out the use of US dollars in everyday transactions within the next three years, the deputy central bank governor said.】

item.title: 施耐德说：美国即将出现的电力紧张将削弱人工智能能力
item.description: 随着数据中心用电需求的激增，以及电网老化和脆弱的冰冷现实，美国将在本十年面临一场潜在的电力危机。【原文：The US faces a potential electricity crisis this decade as a surge in demand to power data centers bumps into the cold reality of aged and vulnerable grids.】

item.title: 越南移动通信世界计划电子业务部门明年上市
item.description: 越南零售巨头移动世界投资公司（Mobile World Investment Corp.【原文：Vietnam’s retail giant Mobile World Investment Corp. is planning an initial public offering for its electronics and mobile store chain in 2026.】

item.title: 安联集团讨论在人工智能转型中削减呼叫中心职位
item.description: 安联集团（Allianz SE）正在就其援助和旅行保险子公司安联伙伴（Allianz Partners）的潜在裁员问题进行谈判，因为该公司正在寻求使用更多的人工智能。【原文：Allianz SE is in talks about potential job cuts at its assistance and travel insurance subsidiary Allianz Partners as it seeks to use more artifical intelligence.】

item.title: 欧洲在国防开支增加的同时豪赌 250 亿美元太空预算
item.description: 随着各国扩大太空军事存在，相当于美国国家航空航天局（NASA）的欧洲航天局（Europe's equivalent of NASA）正在向其成员国寻求在未来三年内提供 220 亿欧元（约合 255 亿美元）的预算，比之前的预算增加了 36%。【原文：Europe’s equivalent of NASA is seeking €22 billion ($25.5 billion) from its member states for the next three years, a 36% increase from its previous budget, as nations expand their military presence in space.】

item.title: 对冲基金扎堆医疗保健股引领市场轮动
item.description: 随着投资者重新考虑对人工智能股票的大规模押注，美国股市转向防御性更强的领域，本月出现了一个明显的赢家：医疗保健公司。【原文：As investors reconsider massive bets on artificial intelligence stocks, a rotation toward more defensive corners of the US equity market has left a clear winner this month: health-care companies.】

item.title: 日本将发行超过 735 亿美元的新债券为经济刺激提供资金
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，日本首相佐那江隆一（Sanae Takaichi）领导的日本政府计划发行比去年更多的新债券，为其经济一揽子计划提供资金。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi’s government plans to issue more new bonds to fund its economic package than the corresponding amount last year, according to people familiar with the matter, as concerns smolder over the nation’s public finances and rising yields.】

item.title: 欧洲央行警告荷兰养老金改革风险引发债券大跌
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）周三警告说，荷兰养老金制度改革可能导致长期债券和利率掉期的抛售。【原文：The reform of the Dutch pension system may result in a selloff in long-maturity bonds and interest-rate swaps, the European Central Bank warned Wednesday.】

item.title: 法国 Canal+ 计划通过首次债券融资约 5 亿欧元
item.description: Canal+ SA 将于本周三首次出售欧元债券，寻求筹集约 5 亿欧元（约合 5.79 亿美元）的资金，这标志着这家法国媒体集团首次进入公共资本市场，为其收购 MultiChoice Group Ltd. 的部分过桥贷款进行再融资。【原文：Canal+ SA is seeking to raise around €500 million ($579 million) from a debut euro bond sale on Wednesday, marking the French media group’s first entry into public capital markets as it refinances part of the bridge loan tied to its MultiChoice Group Ltd. acquisition.】

item.title: 交易商等待中国采购消息，大豆保持稳定
item.description: 大豆价格保持稳定，交易商在等待有关中国购买美国大豆的新消息，而这一消息不太可能在感恩节假期前传出。【原文：Soybean prices held steady as traders awaited fresh news on China’s US purchases, which is unlikely to come before the Thanksgiving holiday.】

item.title: 英伟达股价下跌，对其人工智能主导地位的质疑与日俱增
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）正面临着越来越多的担忧，即其在人工智能计算所用半导体市场上的垄断地位正在逐渐丧失。而这种疑虑正在股市上显现出来。【原文：Nvidia Corp. is facing rising concerns that its stranglehold on the market for semiconductors used in artificial intelligence computing is slipping. And that skepticism is now showing up in the stock market.】

item.title: 中国电动车市场前景黯淡，李书福汽车公司营收不尽如人意
item.description: 李书福汽车公司第四季度业绩预期低于预期，加剧了投资者对其驾驭中国竞争激烈的电动汽车市场能力的担忧。【原文：Li Auto Inc.’s fourth-quarter forecasts fell short of expectations, adding to investor concerns about its ability to navigate China’s fiercely competitive electric vehicle market.】

item.title: 滴滴全球利润大增 67%，可能在香港上市
item.description: 中国打车巨头滴滴出行公司（Didi Global Inc.【原文：Chinese ride-hailing giant Didi Global Inc. reported a 67% quarterly profit rise, a positive sign ahead of a potential Hong Kong listing.】

item.title: 韩国私募股权争论焦点：Homeplus 未中标价
item.description: 韩国最受瞩目的企业改制案凸显了私人股本所有权的风险，而这一案件刚刚出现转机，有可能加深这些担忧。【原文：The most closely watched corporate rehabilitation case in South Korea underscoring risks with private equity ownership just took a turn that threatens to deepen those concerns.】

item.title: 淡马锡的 Pavilion Capital 将与 Seviora 集团合并
item.description: 淡马锡控股私人有限公司（Temasek Holdings Pte.【原文：Temasek Holdings Pte. subsidiaries Pavilion Capital and Seviora Group will be joined together in a move that will grow the latter’s assets under management to $72 billion.】

item.title: 日本央行开始卸载前 ETF 未实现收益激增
item.description: 根据日本央行决定开始卸载交易所交易基金资产后的第一份财务报表，日本央行持有的交易所交易基金市值在 9 月底创下了历史新高。【原文：The market value of the Bank of Japan’s holdings of exchange-traded funds reached a record high at the end of September, according to its first financial statement since deciding to start offloading the assets.】

item.title: 欧洲央行警告高估值加剧金融稳定风险
item.description: 欧洲中央银行认为，该地区金融稳定面临的风险 "升高"，资产估值捉襟见肘，容易出现大幅调整，一些国家面临的财政挑战可能会考验投资者的信心。【原文：The European Central Bank sees “elevated” risks to the region’s financial stability, with stretched asset valuations prone to sharp adjustments and fiscal challenges in some countries that could test investor confidence.】

item.title: 泰国债券销售需求降至至少六年来最低点
item.description: 由于担心主权评级可能下调和利率前景不明朗，泰国出售的 30 年期债券吸引了至少六年来最弱的需求。【原文：Thailand’s sale of 30-year bonds drew the weakest demand in at least six years amid concern over a potential sovereign rating downgrade and uncertainty over the outlook for interest rates.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）警告：德国若不改革将面临增长乏力的风险
item.description: 国际货币基金组织称，德国有可能在经济增长方面表现不佳，除非进行 "大胆的 "改革，否则将面临实现有意义的经济扩张的长期困境。【原文：Germany is in danger of underperforming on growth and faces a longer-term struggle to achieve meaningful expansion unless it pursues “bold” reforms, according to the International Monetary Fund.】

item.title: 美国人准备迎接感恩节出行高峰的空域测试
item.description: 美国航空公司正准备迎接有史以来最繁忙的感恩节旅行，这对刚刚从政府停摆引发的航班限制中恢复过来的紧张航空系统是个考验。【原文：US airlines are bracing for what stands to be the busiest Thanksgiving travel period on record, testing a strained aviation system that’s only just bounced back from flight restrictions prompted by the government shutdown.】
